forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening approaches Downtown San Francisco, a cloak of cloudiness wraps the sky, ensuring a cool night ahead, with temperatures settling into the mid-forties. The gentle north-east wind, a whisper through the streets, carries with it the faint chill of the approaching winter, suggesting a need for light layers—a cozy sweater might serve as a warm companion for the evening stroll. 

Tomorrow promises a shift in mood, as the clouds will part to reveal the sun in all its understated glory. With highs around sixty, the day will feel inviting but not overwhelming, ideal for a quiet morning coffee al fresco or a leisurely walk along the waterfront. The interplay of sun and slight afternoon cooling calls for comfortable attire, perhaps something light yet prepared for the brisk breeze that dances across the bay. As you venture out, the scenic charm of the city lays itself bare, perfect for enjoying a quiet moment in the parks or indulging in a pop-up art exhibit, amidst the backdrop of a city that thrives on creativity and tranquility.
